models.portfolioItems: Each portfolio item represents a SaaS application or mobile app built by AEGONTECH.

portfolioItems.title: Dialable
portfolioItems.description: International calling platform with competitive rates worldwide. Features include call recording, number masking, and credit management.

portfolioItems.title: Maximus IPTV Player
portfolioItems.description: Feature-rich IPTV player for iOS with M3U and Xtream Codes support. Includes EPG, favorites, and Chromecast.

portfolioItems.title: CloudSync Pro
portfolioItems.description: Enterprise file synchronization platform with real-time collaboration, version control, and advanced security features.

portfolioItems.title: FitTrack AI
portfolioItems.description: AI-powered fitness companion app with personalized workout plans, nutrition tracking, and progress analytics.

portfolioItems.title: InvoiceHub
portfolioItems.description: Streamlined invoicing and billing platform for freelancers and small businesses. Automated reminders and payment tracking.

portfolioItems.title: MediaVault
portfolioItems.description: Secure media management app with cloud backup, facial recognition, and smart albums for iOS and Android.
